name: Administrative sex
description: HL7-defined table specifying a person's sex for administrative purposes

values.definition: Person is administratively classified as female
Person is administratively classified as male
Person's administrative sex is other than male or female

notes: Used for administrative purposes and does not necessarily reflect biological sex or gender identity. Field name updated to 'Administrative Sex' in v2.3.

vendorVariations.epic: Supports standard codes with additional internal classifications for specific care areas
vendorVariations.cerner: Uses standard values with organization-specific administrative categories
vendorVariations.allscripts: Standard implementation with optional reporting variations
